itemDescription: George Cross recipient in World War II

wikipedia_page.main: Special Constable Brandon Moss GC (5 June 1909 – 9 August 1999) was a British police officer who was awarded the George Cross for his "superhuman efforts and utter disregard for personal injury" while with the Coventry Constabulary during World War II.

response: *Brandon Moss, 90, British police officer and recipient of the George Cross.
